remarks: Derivative exercise: the derivative with respect to y of A x sin(By), given two constants ` A ` and ` B ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvasinbx $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( CC _D ( y e. CC |-> ( A x. ( sin ` ( B x. y ) ) ) ) ) = ( y e. CC |-> ( ( A x. B ) x. ( cos ` ( B x. y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B y $.
